item.title: Toomas Vendelin
item.description: Iâ€™m a Linux system engineer and a certified Java developer in one package. I’ve got quite some experience in automating server infrastructure under paranoid security requirements (think De-Mail). I’m running this website. I am an avid traveller and used to be an active couchsurfer before Couchsurfing was commercialized. I speak English, Russian, German, Spanish, Estonian and some basic Portuguese and Indonesian. I play chess when bored with everything else.
